citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15 on
20-JUL-17.
The licensee was contacted by telephone from the driveway of the site and stated that she was out of the area and
was not available for an inspection.
